Support

ContinualAI is an official non-profit research organization. Donors and sponsors are the financial backbone of our activities. Upholding our commitment to being open, collaborative, and inclusive, all organizational documents (including detailed yearly financial statements) are openly accessible on our website.

Please consider donating to ContinualAI to support our mission of creating and consolidating an open community of researchers and enthusiasts working together on the topic of Continual Learning for AI! Every backer or sponsor will be listed on this page. For further information, contact us at financials@continualai.org.
